titles.title: Black-figure lekythos: man and boy having sex

makers.displaymaker: attributed to the Taleides Painter, Greek, Attic, active ca. 560-ca. 530 BCE

texts.textentryhtml: Purchased by Mr. Rouald Segal, London, from Sotheby's in 1966; purchased by the Museum in 1986.

bibliography.boilertext: Irish Bronze Age, Egyptian, western asiatic, Greek, Etruscan and Roman antiquities; Islamic pottery and metalwork, (London: Sotheby's, 1966).
bibliography.citation: Irish Bronze Age, Egyptian, western asiatic, Greek, Etruscan and Roman antiquities; Islamic pottery and metalwork, (London: Sotheby's, 1966)., lot no. 115, and illustrated on plate facing p. 54

bibliography.boilertext: K.J. Dover, Greek Homosexuality, (Cambridge, MA: Harvard University Press, 1978).
